content:
> Is a proof just a hashTreeRoot(merkleizedState) ?
<@570268431522201601> 

The input to the simple transfer EE is made up of one or more txs, plus a merkle proof of the various pieces of state required to perform the state transition and calculate a post state.  We are using a binary merkle tree for this proof backend, but it would be cool to have other implementations.  It's ultimately up to the designer of the EE to choose their own proof format so it would be nice to experiment and build up a library of them so they can be reused.
